title: Bonkers for Loot
description: A couch co-op game where you play as sliding penguins against each other to catch the most amount of fish. Fight for your fish or slide trying!

title: Tides of Oblivion
description: Stranded on an island in the middle of nowhere with Mother Nature trying to kill you. Prepare for coming storms and find your way off the island!

title: Smack 'n' Snatch
description: You're a forest loner living away from civilisation. Defend against waves of squirrels stealing your items and hold out for as long as you can!

title: Asteroid Trap
description: A simple space shooter game, but why don't you see who can get the highest score... You or one of your friends?

title: Slither 'n' Chomp
description: A python Snake game where an enemy is trying to steal your food. Get the foost as fast as possible to not starve to death!
